name: i want to fly(live)
lyric:
Party people all around me but I just could not fit in

In the corner drinking cola
Pretending it's a black vodka

Lenny came to take me away surely everyone felt OK

Brandy came and take me away surely everyone felt OK

Talked to myself pinched myself

I wrote ten songs to entertain myself
My friends were dancing with their new friends
I was with my imagined band

Brane came and take me away surely everyone felt OK

Andrew came to take me away surely everyone felt OK

Come to take me away yes surely OK

Jesus come please take me away

I walked in the middle of the night
I walked in the middle of the night

God come take me away is there OK

Come please take me away

I've learnt to fly now I can fly anytime

Well I survived till the end

Make a little over again

Gonna make it all over again

Until the next weekend

Jesus come to take me away surely everyone is OK

God come to take me away

Is really OK

Oh is really OK

See you all over again next weekend

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 从来没有念头想爱什么人

comments.brief:
完全不一样的感觉……但一样的好听！

来自iPhone客户端
